reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits true to size and is comfortable, with one noting it's not itchy or noisy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering dress!
items.body: Love love this dress! It is wonderful quality and fit. I have gotten so many compliments on this dress for how flattering is it. The color was also so beautiful for holiday photos. I want to buy in more colors! Read more
items.author: Mary Ann

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great find !
items.body: I purchased this for a wedding and wore it with country boots. The material is good quality not see through at all, it’s also not itchy or noisy lol very flowy, comfortable, and flattering. The color was also beautiful, it has lots of stretch to it so I decided to size down one . I usually wear a large but purchased a medium. I am 4’11 125lbs. And C cup in the bust area. It fit great and not super long to where it was dragging which was a plus for me. Read more
items.author: Gabb

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a beautiful dress
items.body: The fabric is so soft and not thin, see through. I felt so good and beautiful in this dress! I plan on getting this in many more colors. Read more
items.author: Riley Bruner

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very very cute
items.body: I really loved these nails color of this dress and overall fit! The size was flattering on my body shape which was a nice feeling and made me comfortable in what I was wearing! These material was a little on the thinner side for my taste but overall still a very cute dress! Read more
items.author: Elisabeth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality for the Price
items.body: I can't wait to wear this dress!!! I was a little nervous buying it because I've always struggled with dresses made like this making me look pregnant lol but this dress is so comfy and so flattering. I am 5'4" 199lbs and it fit amazing. Definitely worth the price. I will be wearing it over and over again. Read more
items.author: Alyssa Lester

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, but sweaty and not breathable
items.body: Super pretty, but the material is not breathable at all despite being so thin. It will make you sweat like crazy, even in the dead of winter. I really wish this had been made of something like cotton or even rayon. It’s super cute, and I love the fit and look, but the material is so bad that I’m thinking of cutting the dress apart and using the pieces as a template to sew a duplicate in a material I prefer. Read more
items.author: Susan Wilson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super flattering
items.body: Fits great and very flattering. I’m a 38H and it wasn’t too much spillage at all. I thought the sleeves were a touch too short and for reference I’m 5’5” Read more
items.author: Monica Gonzalez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick girl approved!
items.body: Thick girl approved! Love this dress! It fits true to size. I usually struggle with finding clothing that will appropriately fit my large bust and backside and it’s perfect for both! Read more
items.author: Carlie Brown

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi Split is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi Split is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Lake Blue, Rust, White, Burgundy, Army Green, Black, White Floral, Yello Floral, Navy Blue, Emerald Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
